TopicTitle: ‘SSTUReflectionProbe’ object keeps on making my ships crash

Articles.Content: When my ship is going through re-entry, it keeps on crashing into an object called ‘SSTUReflectionProbe’. It’s an invisible object but after it crashes I see what appears to be a pink box like a missing texture from GMOD. I’ve already asked on Reddit but no one could figure it out so I was wondering if anyone here would be able to help me?
